title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7354.8 - Heating, plumbing, electrical, mechanical ventilation systems and equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7354.8 - Heating, plumbing, electrical, mechanical ventilation systems and equipment

State Regulations

Heating, plumbing, electrical, mechanical ventilation
systems and equipment shall be maintained in a good, safe, sanitary, and
serviceable condition and in compliance with all applicable laws, codes, rules
and regulations related thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7354.8

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
